item.title: Viewpoint: BlackRock to Submit XRP Spot ETF Application to SEC
item.description: On August 8th, according to Nate Geraci, who is the President of The ETF Store. After the Ripple appeal is resolved, BlackRock is going to submit an XRP ETF application to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission in order to promote the portfolio diversification of cryptocurrency ETFs. Nate Geraci pointed out that it would be unreasonable for BlackRock to ignore other crypto assets. If BlackRock fails to do so, it is as if it is telling the market that only BTC and ETH have value.

item.title: LABUBU Meme Coin Market Cap Surges, Surpassing $14 Million with a 24-hour Gain of 54%
item.description: On August 8th, according to the market information of GMGN, the market value of the Meme coin LABUBU, which is based on the trendy IP of Bubble Mart, has rebounded and exceeded 14 million US dollars. It is currently reported at 13.5 million US dollars, with a 24-hour increase of 54%.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: Analyst: The current market has shifted from intense bearish pressure to a neutral bullish outlook.
item.description: On August 8th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. made a post stating, "Since the end of July, the SMA-120 line has reversed its long-term bearish trend and crossed above the zero axis. A similar attempt a week ago ended in failure. The market has now shifted from an aggressive bearish phase to a neutral bullish phase. If the SMA-120 can remain above the zero axis in the next two days, it will confirm this trend reversal."

item.title: Ethereum Foundation to Donate an Additional $500,000 for Roman Storm's Legal Defense
item.description: On August 8th, Hsiao-Wei Wang, one of the co-executive directors of the Ethereum Foundation, tweeted that the Ethereum Foundation would donate an additional $500,000 to support the legal defense of Roman Storm, the co-founder of Tornado Cash.

item.title: Top Solana Launchpad Market Share in the Last 24 Hours: pump.fun, Letsbonk, BAGS ranked top three
item.description: On August 8th, according to the Jupiter Data Dashboard, within the past 24 hours in the Solana launchpad market share ranking, pump.fun took the first place with 51%, Letsbonk came in second with 26.6%, and BAGS ranked third with 17.6%.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company increased its holdings by 50 bitcoins, bringing the total position to 2100 bitcoins.
item.description: August 8th. The Smarter Web Company, a publicly listed company based in the UK, increased its holdings of Bitcoin by 50 coins, raising the total to 2100 coins.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Fireverse (FIR), with the first-stage airdrop threshold set at 233 points.
item.description: August 8th. According to official channels, Binance Alpha is the inaugural platform to launch Sidekick (K), and Alpha trading is scheduled to commence on August 8, 2025, at 15:00 (UTC+8).Eligible users can utilize Alpha Points to claim a 250 K token airdrop on the Alpha event page within 24 hours following the start of trading.The Binance Alpha airdrop will be dispensed in two stages:Stage One (first 18 hours): Users possessing at least 233 Alpha Points are eligible to claim the airdrop.Stage Two (last 6 hours): Users holding at least 200 Alpha Points can participate in the second stage of the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. In case the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points per hour.Claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha Points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: Affected by the listing on Binance Futures and Kraken, CARV surged over 12% in the last 12 hours.
item.description: On August 8th, based on market information, the CARV perpetual contract was launched on Binance Futures, enabling up to 50x leverage trading. Subsequently, on August 8th, Kraken opened CARV spot trading. Possibly due to the consecutive positive news from these two major exchanges, the price of CARV surged by more than 12% within 12 hours.CARV is the world's first infrastructure platform that supports Sovereign AI Beings. It is built around identity, data, and on-chain execution to create a decentralized intelligent being ecosystem and is recognized as one of the key projects in the Web3 AI track.

item.title: Peter Schiff: Trump Allowing Retirement Funds to Invest in Cryptocurrency Will Worsen America's Retirement Savings Deficiency
item.description: August 8th, Economist and cryptocurrency critic Peter Schiff tweeted, "Most Americans possess far too little savings to sustain their retirement. By allowing Americans to invest their meager retirement savings from their 401(k) accounts into Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, Trump will only exacerbate this problem."

item.title: Bithumb Adds TreeHouse (TREE) KRW Trading Pair
item.description: On August 8th, according to official channels, Bithumb has incorporated the TreeHouse (TREE) KRW trading pair.
